author: remm
msg: - The shared classloader is created based on catalina.base
- The shared loader was created by BootstrapService
as the old directory structure (lib and classes, instead

author: kinman
msg: - For tag handlers with empty body, generate simpler codes.
- Don't call doInitBody() when doStartTag doesn't return EVAL_BODY_BUFFERED
- Cleanup format of generated Java codes.

author: bip
msg: Changed the SsiInvokerServlet to always set the Content-type header information.
Thanks to Rami Hanninen for submitting a bugreport.

author: craigmcc
msg: Port the updated filter example to the HEAD branch.

author: craigmcc
msg: Make it possible to configure character encoding *only* if not set by the
browser, as well as setting it unconditionally.
